page.title: 07DANES HILL COURT,OXSHOTT
page.content: Danes Hill is now a private school for boys and girls aged 3 to 13. It was built in the 1890's of red bricks and stone. It has stone mullioned windows, an imitation Dutch upper floor with a pigeon loft over a large barn. In general, it is imitation Jacobean with many outbuildings of wood and brick. The house and the grounds are in very good condition and there is a cricket pitch and a football pitch. There is an elaborate clock high up on the front of the house with the words "Danes Hill Court" round the edge.
